title: Diamond and Marlowe

content:encoded:
Richard Diamond, Private Detective starts off Case Closed this week with his story from January 25, 1952, The Al Brenners Case.

(30:06) We close the show with The Dude From Manhattan, an episode from The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe that originally aired July 2, 1949.

Download CaseClosed743
